name: Veritas Design System + App Design
description:
Hey folks 👋🏼


Veritas is the design system of Udacity. Being the most praised platform for its ease of use and simple to use interface, I have tried to create a basic version of Veritas with input, buttons, tags, badges, avatars, colours, typography and a bunch of examples to help you get started with. 


Also, if you are interested in knowing more about the design system and the thought process behind the app design, do check this out.


https://medium.com/@vineeth887/udacity-mobile-app-b6796034838d
